verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In another bombshell revelation] , [ARG0: the BBC] [V: reported] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: that President Trump ’s lawyer Michael Cohen was paid by Ukraine to arrange a meeting between the country ’s president and Trump] .
In another bombshell revelation , the BBC reported Wednesday that President Trump ’s lawyer Michael Cohen [V: was] paid by Ukraine to arrange a meeting between the country ’s president and Trump .
